alert.note: Alert for Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 12:24AM AKST until January 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dense freezing fog with visibilities of one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Angoon, Juneau, Petersburg, Wrangell, and Kake. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. With temperatures near or below freezing, icy conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect intermittent periods of visibility greater than one quarter mile.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
